title: 3 Quick Ways to Uninstall Windows 10 Store Apps

steps.title: Launch the Start menu.
steps.content: Launch the Start menu. Click the Start button, located at the bottom-left. You can also press the âŠž Win keyboard key.

steps.title: Locate and right-click the app you wish to uninstall.
steps.content: Locate and right-click the app you wish to uninstall. Right-click the app's tile or listing in the All apps list. A context menu will appear.

steps.title: Uninstall the app.
steps.content: Uninstall the app. Click the Uninstall from the context menu that appears.

steps.title: Confirm the app uninstallation.
steps.content: Confirm the app uninstallation. A mini confirmation dialog will appear. Click Uninstall to confirm that you really want to uninstall the app. If you've changed your mind, simply click away. After doing this, the app will disappear from the list and be uninstalled. This may take up to thirty seconds.

steps.title: Launch the search feature.
steps.content: Launch the search feature. Click the search bar/icon on your taskbar. It may appear as a circular Cortana icon.

steps.title: Search for the app you wish to uninstall.
steps.content: Search for the app you wish to uninstall. Type its name in.

steps.title: Right-click the app from the results.
steps.content: Right-click the app from the results. This will prompt a context menu to appear.

steps.title: Uninstall the app.
steps.content: Uninstall the app. Click the Uninstall from the context menu that appears.

steps.title: Confirm the app uninstallation.
steps.content: Confirm the app uninstallation. A mini confirmation dialog will appear. Click Uninstall to confirm that you really want to uninstall the app. If you've changed your mind, simply click away. After doing this, the app will disappear from the list and be uninstalled. This may take up to thirty seconds.

steps.title: Open the Settings app
steps.content: Open the Settings app . Click the Start button and select the settings gear .

steps.title: Go to the Apps category.
steps.content: Go to the Apps category. If you don't have this option, click System instead. You're probably running an older version of Windows 10.

steps.title: Locate the app you wish to uninstall.
steps.content: Locate the app you wish to uninstall. Use the search bar to find a specific app if you wish. You can change the order of the list by selecting a different sort order. You can also use the search bar above the app list to find the application.

steps.title: Uninstall the app.
steps.content: Uninstall the app. Click the Uninstall .

steps.title: Confirm the app uninstallation.
steps.content: Confirm the app uninstallation. A mini confirmation dialog will appear. Click Uninstall to confirm that you really want to uninstall the app. If you've changed your mind, simply click away. After doing this, the app will disappear from the list and be uninstalled. This may take up to thirty seconds.
